message.raw:
I agree.

runviewer is currently broken with the latest version of pyqtgraph, so it would be good if the installer only installed the working version of pyqtgraph rather than the latest. 

I suggest the installer checks current installed version (if any) against a required version specified in the dependencies text file. I suggest using 1.2.3+ notation to indicate newer releases of libraries are acceptable provided the major version number has not changed, but that we use such notation sparingly (e.g. PyQt could probably be 4.11.2+ but pyqtgraph and pyzmq should be specific versions we have tested with)
